thread.section_title: Lifebroker Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lifebroker | www.lifebroker.com.au
thread.title: KYLIE ENO

author: KYLIE ENO
title: KYLIE ENO
text:
JUST LIKE TO MENTION A SPECIAL THANK YOU TO JULIA ALLSOP FOR A GREAT JOB IN PHONE MANNER AND CUSTOMER SERVICE.
I HAVE HAD MY INCOME PROTECTION WITH THIS COMPANY FOR 4 YEARS AND CUSTOMER SERVICE TO DATE HAS BEEN SATISFACTORY. BUT AFTER DEALING WITH JULIA , SHE ALLWAYS RETURNED PHONE CALLS AND FOLLOWED UP ANY QUESTIONS I HAD WITH A VERY POLITE AND FRIENDLY MANNER. IT MAKES DEALING WITH ( INSURANCE ) COMPANIES A LOT EASIER WITH STAFF LIKE THAT.
THANKS JULIA HOPEFULLY I GET YOUR HELP IN THE FUTURE.
REGARDS RICHARD ENO
